com.dermalog.android.imageio

Class ImageIOSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dermalog.android.imageio.ImageIOSDK

  • public class ImageIOSDK
extends Object
    ImageIOSDK is a utility class for conversion Image to and from BMP, WSQ and JPG2000 format.

    Important: This class is depending on DermalogEmbeddedBiometrics and will only work when the Android packages for DermalogEmbeddedBiometrics and DermalogImageIO are installed on the device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create an ImageIOSDK object and check for the required packages.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws ImageIOException
        Initialize the SDK.

        Important: The initialization requires an attached DERMALOG finger print scanner with granted Android USB permissions.
        Please refer to EmbeddedBiometricsSDK.requestDevicePermissions()

        Throws:
        ImageIOException

      • uninitialize

        public void uninitialize()
                  throws ImageIOException
        Uninitialize the SDK and free native resources.

        Note: This method must be called when the object is not used any more and before the garbage collector deletes the object.

        Throws:
        ImageIOException

      • convertImage

        public byte[] convertImage(byte[] image,
                           int outFormat,
                           String options)
                    throws ImageIOException
        Convert an image into the specified format
        Parameters:
        image - the input image
        outFormat - output format id ImageIOFormat
        options - output format options: ImageIOFormat.compressionParameter(int, double). Set to null or an empty String to use default implementation.
        Returns:
        byte array with the converted image
        Throws:
        ImageIOException

        Parameters:

        outFormat - output format id ImageIOFormat

        Parameters:
        fileName - the path to the image to read
        outFormat - output format id ImageIOFormat
        options - options output format options. ImageIOFormat.compressionParameter(int, double). Set to null or an empty String to use default implementation.

        ImageIOException

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage(String fileName,
                       byte[] image,
                       int outFormat,
                       double compression)
                throws ImageIOException
        Write an image to the file system. The input image will be converted to the specified format.
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to write the image
        image - input image
        outFormat - output format id ImageIOFormat
        compression - compression ratio (Format dependent)
        Throws:
        ImageIOException

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage(String fileName,

                       int outFormat,

        Parameters:

        image - input image
        outFormat - output format id ImageIOFormat
        options - options output format options. ImageIOFormat.compressionParameter(int, double). Set to null or an empty String to use default implementation.
